players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Charlie: "Bob is suspicious, I think he's the detective."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso, I investigated him and found out he's one of them."
Diana: "I think Bob is the detective, he remained silent when I said Charlie was a mafioso."

players.name: Charlie
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.

You: "Bob is suspicious, I think he's the detective."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso, I investigated him and found out he's one of them."
Diana: "I think Bob is the detective, he remained silent when I said Charlie was a mafioso."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
